taskDescription: What is the relationship between 1 kW and watts?
detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>1</mn>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
      <mi mathvariant="normal">W</mi>
    </mrow>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mn>1,000</mn>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mi mathvariant="normal">w</mi>
      <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
      <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
      <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
      <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
    </mrow>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">1\,{\rm{kW}} = 1{,}000\,{\rm{watts}}</annotation></semantics></math>
